item.title: Examples
item.description: This is a placeholder page that shows you how to use this template site. Do you have any example applications or code for your users in your repo or elsewhere? Link to your examples here.

item.title: vsftp 구성
item.description: TL;DR 12 passive mode, explicit ftp over tls, rclone 호환 구성 방화벽 구성 보안을 고려하여 21/tcp port는 임의의 6xxxx/tcp로 port forwarding command port인 6xxxx/tcp port와 data port인 6xxxx-6xxxx/tcp port를 inbound에서 허용 sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-forward-port=port=6xxxx:proto=tcp:toport=21 && \ sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=6xxxx-6xxxx/tcp && \ sudo firewall-cmd --reload && \ sudo firewall-cmd --list-all selinux 구성 /home directory, symbolic link, passive mode를 허용 Permissive mode인 경우에도 영향 있으므로 반드시 구성1 sudo setsebool -P ftpd_use_passive_mode on && \ sudo setsebool -P ftpd_full_access on 인증서 구성 acme.

item.title: css 테스트
item.description: Example CSS body { font-size: 16px; /* comment */ } Example HTML <a href="/about.html">Example</a> <!-- comment --> Example Go HTML template {{ with $.Page.Params.content }} {{ . | $.Page.RenderString }} {{/* comment */}} {{ end }} Example JS if ([1,"one",2,"two"].includes(value)){ console.log("Number is either 1 or 2."); // comment } Example markdown {{< figure src="kitten.jpg" >}} [example](https://example.org "An example") <!-- comment --> toml [params] bool = true # comment string
